Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Krakow and Paris, Hamburg and Manchester, Vienna and Reykjavik, Paris and Vienna, Krakow and Vienna, Manchester and Vienna, Manchester and Krakow, Paris and Reykjavik, Hamburg and Paris, Hamburg and Vienna, Manchester and Paris.
